      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Increasing the turning effect of a spanner on a nut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhöhung des dreheneffektes eines Schlüssels 
auf einer Mutter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Augmentation de l'effet de rotation d'une clé sur
un écrou</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aumentando o efeito de giro de uma chave de boca 
em uma porca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aumento dell'effetto di rotazione di una chiave 
su un dado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αύξηση της γυρίζοντας επίδρασης ενός κλειδιού σε ένα
καρύδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aumento del efecto que da vuelta de una llave de 
tuercas en una tuerca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two spanners of different lengths, which provide moments to loosen a nut.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Schlüssel der 
unterschiedlichen Längen, die Momente liefern, um eine Mutter zu 
lösen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre deux clés des 
différentes longueurs, qui fournissent des moments pour détacher un 
écrou.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra duas chaves de boca dos 
comprimentos diferentes, que fornecem momentos para afrouxar uma 
porca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra due chiavi delle 
lunghezze differenti, che forniscono i momenti per allentare un dado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο κλειδιά των 
διαφορετικών μηκών, τα οποία παρέχουν τις στιγμές για να 
χαλαρώσουν ένα καρύδι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a dos llaves de tuercas
de diversas longitudes, que proporcionan a momentos para aflojar una 
tuerca.</string>
          </description>
